response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to both of us. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire the product at a discount while securing its value for future use. I trust this proposal will resonate with your interest in maximizing your investment in high-quality items. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
